code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{logo1,gojek}from"../../assets";import{navLinks_detail}from"../../constant";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const[active,setActive]=useState("about");const[iniNavbar,setIniNavbar]=useState(false);const scrollHeader=()=>{if(window.scrollY>=20){setIniNavbar(true);}else{setIniNavbar(false);}};useEffect(()=>{window.addEventListener('scroll',scrollHeader);return()=>{window.removeEventListener('scroll',scrollHeader);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:" fixed z-10 w-full transition duration-300 ".concat(iniNavbar?'bg-orange-gradient-navbar':'bg-transparent'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"header px-16 w-full flex justify-between items-center navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo1,alt:"Goship",className:"w-[150px] h-[40px] "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"list-none sm:flex hidden justify-end items-center flex-1",children:[navLinks_detail.map((nav,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"font-poppins font-normal cursor-pointer text-[16px] ".concat(active===nav.title?"text-orange":"text-dimblack"," ").concat(index===navLinks_detail.length-1?"mr-0":"mr-10"),onClick:()=>setActive(nav.title),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#".concat(nav.id),children:nav.title})},nav.id)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"pl-20 ",children:"halo, ridwan"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sm:pl-2 sm:py-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:gojek,alt:"Goship",className:"w-[40px] h-[40px]"})})]})]})});};export default Navbar;
